module.name: Call Waiting
module.description: Provides an option to turn on/off call waiting
module.changelog: *2.11.0.4* Generate License file *2.11.0.2 * Bump version to try and force it to install *2.11.0.1* #6857 *2.11.0.0* bump version *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.0* #4532, #4651 *2.8.0.0* published 2.8 version *2.7.0.0* localizations *2.6.0.1* Added publisher/lic *2.6.0.0* #3650, #3651, localizations *2.5.0* localization string enclosures *2.4.0* bumped for 2.4 *1.1.2.2* changed categories *1.1.2.1* bump for rc1 *1.1.2* changed ${CALLERID(number)} to ${AMPUSER} to accomodate CID number masquerading *1.1* First release for 2.2
